pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api

Interface FrontController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFrontController

    public interface FrontController
    Implementations of this interface should be able to handle every control and non control message, coming from low level Websocket connector implementation.

    Created on: 2011-11-22 17:52:26

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
    See Also:
    DefaultFrontController

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processCommand(WebsocketConnector connector, int operationCode, Object data)
      Processes incoming command, with unspecified type of data and operation code given as integer number.

    • Method Detail

      • processCommand

        void processCommand(WebsocketConnector connector,
                  int operationCode,
                  Object data)
        Processes incoming command, with unspecified type of data and operation code given as integer number.
        Parameters:
        connector - low level, server engine dependent abstraction of client-server connection.
        operationCode - code of requested operation. List of available operation code is specified by WebSockets protocol and also can be found in OperationCode enumeration.
        data - data sent by client.
        See Also:
        Operation code
